sn35.15:1: "Cakkhussāhaṁ, bhikkhave, assādapariyesanaṁ acariṁ. Yo cakkhussa assādo tadajjhagamaṁ. Yāvatā cakkhussa assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho. Cakkhussāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ādīnavapariyesanaṁ acariṁ.
sn35.15:2: Yāvakīvañcāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imesaṁ channaṁ ajjhattikānaṁ āyatanānaṁ assādañca assādato, ādīnavañca ādīnavato, nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ nābbhaññāsiṁ … pe … paccaññāsiṁ.
